participant_1.background:
My favorite websites are ones that teach me about new places to climb and share recipes for brownies.
i like to eat cheetos.
winter is my favorite season.
i work at a hospital.
formal situations make me uncomfortable.

participant_2.background:
I took a few deep breaths and tried to center myself.
I am proud of my first home purchase.
I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are.
I'm a determined person who doesn't give up easily, even when faced with challenges.
I spend time with my book club and read books I love.

content.text: Hi there. How are you doing today?
I am doing great! I am excited about the weekend. What are you up to?
I am just relaxing at home, reading a book. I have a big trip coming up so I am trying to get a head start on my reading.
That sounds like fun. I love to read too! I usually go to the library every week.
I love the library! I have a library card but I usually buy my books online.
I like to buy books online too! I just love the smell of a new book.
Me too! I like to sit and read for hours. It is so relaxing.
Me too! I read so much that my family teases me about being a bookworm.
I am not sure what I would do without my books. They are my escape from the world.
I agree! Books are the best!
I am glad we both love to read! It is so nice to talk to someone who understands.
Me too! I love talking about books.
Well, I should probably get back to my book. It was nice talking to you!
It was nice talking to you too! Have a great weekend!
